About this item

  • Size: Width 38.2 inches (970 mm) x Length 76.8 inches (1950 mm) x Thickness 2.0 inches (50 mm); Weight: Approx 10.1 lbs (4.6 kg).
  • Descriptions apply for both 2.0 inch and 1.4 inch versions (5 cm and 3.5 cm).This is the premium 2.0-inch (5 cm) version. Thank you for your understanding.
  • Main unit: Made in Japan. Dedicated internal cover for the memory foam mattress: Made in China.
  • Uses 100% unique memory foam “Ultra Visco Elastic”. Its excellent shock absorption and resilience prevents it from becoming misshapen from body heat and pressure. It fits perfectly to your body like it has been custom-made for you.Made with 100% proprietary material that provides a comfortable sleeping experience
  • Supports a natural sleeping position: With Ultra Visco Elastic, it provides a custom-made fit. The memory foam material has excellent flexibility and resilience.It molds itself to fit the curves of your body, so it envelops your entire body as if wrapping you in a hug.The soft but supportive exquisite comfort is addictive.Provides everyone with support for their bedtime.
  • Just throw it over the bed or futon you’re using now.No need to buy new furniture: Just lay it over the bed mattress or futon you’re using now for a comfortable night’s sleep.No need to replace your bedding. It’s convenient and easy to use.
  • Disperses the body weight placed on your lower back and shoulders: Normal mattresses usually concentrate the weight of the body on the lower back and shoulders, so the veins in those places are compressed. This causes poor circulation, discomfort, and pain.The True Sleeper Premium disperses the entire weight of your body and gently envelops it.
  • Keeps your back straight, maintains a natural sleeping position: When your spine is crooked, it puts strain on your neck and back.True Sleep Premium uses memory foam material so it maintains an ideal sleeping posture without discomfort.
  • Sizes: Semi-double, double, queen.
  • Main unit: Polyurethane foam. Dedicated inner cover for memory foam mattress: 100% Polyester.

Product description

True Sleeper Premium memory foam mattress with excellent flexibility and resilience.This is a long-selling memory foam mattress that solves your sleeping problems.It is an overlay mattress, which means you simply have to lay it over your existing futon or mattress.

Descriptions apply for both 2.0 inch and 1.4 inch versions (5 cm and 3.5 cm).This is the premium 2.0-inch (5 cm) version. Thank you for your understanding.

How are ratings calculated?

5.0 out of 5 stars 腰痛がある人は購入するべき
Reviewed in Japan on February 26, 2024
Style: doublePattern Name: 2021 Older Model (Regular)Size: 厚さ5cmVerified Purchase
慢性的な腰痛と変形性脊椎症を持っていて寝るだけで体が痛くなっていたのですが、本商品を購入して寝るのがかなり楽になりました。
流石に肩までは楽にはなりませんが、それでもかなりの鎮痛効果があります。
搬送時はかなりコンパクトに圧縮されていて、小さく思い状態でしたがすぐに膨らみました。
あと、ベッドのサイズを測って正しいサイズを購入すればかなり快適に睡眠が取れます。
